sourcesContent:
export const getTransactionColor = status => {
    switch(status) {
        case 'Client Approved': return 'red'
        case 'Sent for recording': return '#e67e22'
        case 'Recording received': return '#f39c12'
        case 'IVR creation': return '#f1c40f'
        case 'Testing (Phase 1)': return '#C4E538'
        case 'Testing (Phase 2)': return '#2ecc71'
        case 'Testing (Phase 3)': return 'green'
        case 'Campaign ready': return 'darkgreen'
        default: return ''
    }
}

export const getUserColor = status => {
    if (status === 'Administrator' || status === 'Admin') return 'red'
    if (status === 'Campaign Team') return 'blue'
    if (status === 'DevOps Team') return 'cyan'
}

export const getLangColor = lang => {
	switch(lang) {
		case 'English': return 'blue'
		case 'Hindi': return 'cyan'
		case 'Tamil': return 'gold'
		case 'Telugu': return 'red'
		case 'Kannada': return 'volcano'
		case 'Gujarati': return 'purple'
        case 'Marathi': return 'magenta'
        default: return 'green'
	}
}

export const getChannelColor = channel => {
	switch(channel) {
		case 'smartVoice': return 'green'
		case 'smartText': return 'blue'
		case 'smartEmail' : return 'magenta'
		default: return 'red'
	}
}

export const getCustomerColor = customer => {
	switch(customer) {
		case "Axis Bank": return 'blue' 
		case "ICICI Bank": return 'cyan'
		case "RBL": return 'red'
		case "TVS": return 'purple'
		case "IDFC": return 'volcano'
		case "Bajaj": return 'gold'
		case "TCL": return 'lime'
		case "TCHFL": return 'magenta'
		default: return 'green'
	}
}

export const getProductColor = product => {
	switch(product) {
		case "MFI": return 'blue'
		case "Loan": return 'cyan'
        case "Credit Card": return 'red'
        case "Auto Loan": return 'orange'
		case "Agri Loan": return 'purple'
		case "Tractor Loan": return 'magenta'
		case "EMI on Debit Card": return 'volcano'
		case "CD-SNC": return 'gold'
		case "Common Borrowers": return 'lime'
		case "Pay Later": return 'geekblue'
		default: return 'green'
	}
}

export const getSegmentColor = segment => {
	switch(segment) {
		case 'Pre Due': return 'blue'
		case 'Post Due': return 'cyan'
        case 'Bucket X': return 'red'
        case 'NPA': return 'orange'
		case 'W/Off': return 'purple'
		case 'Phase 1': return 'magenta'
		case 'Phase 2': return 'volcano'
		case 'Phase 3': return 'gold'
		case 'Phase 4 (Pre 90)': return 'lime'
		case 'Phase 4 (90+)': return 'geekblue'
		default: return 'green'
	}
}

export const getTypeColor = type => {
	switch(type) {
		case "Reminder": return 'blue'
		case "Impact": return 'cyan'
        case "Legal": return 'volcano'
        case "Auto Loan": return 'warning'
		case "Agri Loan": return 'purple'
		case "Tractor Loan": return 'magenta'
		case "EMI on Debit Card": return 'volcano'
		case "CD-SNC": return 'gold'
		case "Common Borrowers": return 'lime'
		case "Pay Later": return 'geekblue'
		default: return 'green'
	}
}


export const getCategoryColor = (category, segment) => {
    switch(segment) {
        case 'Predue': case 'Covid Top Up':
            if (category in ["Basic", "Basic - NPDC", "Cleantrack", "Charges", "Other", "NDCC-Instrument", "NDCC-Instrument-Technical Issue", "DCC(Cash Base)"]) return 'volcano'
            break
        case 'Postdue':
            if (category in ["CIBIL", "Charges", "Action", "NC_1", "NC_2", "Technical Issue", "Avoid Action", "Legal To Be Initiated", "Legal Inbound", "Followup", "PTP Rem", "Broken PTP", ]) return 'green'
            break
        case 'BucketX': case 'NPA': case 'DPD': case 'W/Off':
            if (category in ["Soft Reminder", "Collection Reminder", "Impact Reminder 1", "Impact Reminder 2", "Legal Reminder", "Legal Action", "Impact"]) return 'lime'
            break
        case 'Phase 1':
            if (category in ["Basic_IVR1", "Basic_IVR2", "Charges_IVR1", "Charges_IVR2", "Clean Track_IVR1", "Clean Track_IVR2"]) return 'geekblue'
            break
        case 'Phase 2':
            if (category in ["Good Order_IVR1", "Good Order_IVR2", "Long Lasting_IVR1", "Long Lasting_IVR2", "Relationship Status_IVR1", "Relationship Status_IVR2"]) return 'warning'
            break
        case 'Phase 3':
            if (category in ["Avoid Action_IVR1", "Avoid Action_IVR2", "Action to be initiated_IVR1", "Action to be initiated_IVR2", "Action Initiated_IVR1", "Action Initiated_IVR2"]) return 'purple'
            break
        case 'Phase 4 (Pre 90)':
            if (category in ["Degradation of account_IVR1", "Degradation of account_IVR2", "Urgency_IVR1", "Urgency_IVR2", "Avoid Action_IVR1", "Avoid Action_IVR2"]) return 'magenta'
            break
        case 'Phase 4 (90+)':
            if (category in ["Action to be initiated_IVR1", "Action to be initiated_IVR2", "Action Initiated_IVR1", "Action Initiated_IVR2", "Inbound_IVR1", "Inbound_IVR2"]) return 'cyan'
            break
        default: return 'red'
    }
}
